extDesc.message: Quickly navigate Tumblr posts and pages with the keyboard.

bugEmailSubject.description: Subject line of a bug report email message.

bugEmailBody.message:
I found a problem while browsing $url$ with Tumblr HotKeys.

Please take a look at the issue since it prevents me from being able to use this extension the way I would like to.

Sincerely,

Tumblr HotKeys #1 Fan
bugEmailBody.description: Body of a bug report email message.
